item.title: Abandoned vehicle-no number plates, 7th August
item.description:
This car has been parked in Richmond Place in a HE09 zone since before Christmas 2024. It has no number plates on either the back or front of the car so would not have a valid permit to park in that area or on a public road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Invermore Place, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bike left unattended, 7th August
item.description:
Learner moped left on road for 3 weeks plus. the road is constantly being used to dump cars/bikes from people that donâ€™t live on on the street. congleton grove needs to be made permit only to avoid nuisance vehicles taking up resident parking. people dump vehicles on this road and leave it for weeks outside peoples houses. itâ€™s not right. no respect for the people that live here

item.title: Constant fly tipping at 5 Gloucester Drive, 7th August
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gloucester Drive, Hackney, London
